A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Like several others I created my Rotten Tomatoes account just to review Star Wars.  So many others have described well why this movie is terrible so I'm not going to waste my time and repeat.  Just briefly as a movie it's ok but as a Star Wars movie it's terrible.  It's more like just another comic book movie with Star Wars characters thrown in.  I doubt I'll bother seeing any future Star Wars movies on the big screen.
